英文解釋 (English Explanation): The amount listed in the loan application.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人最初申請的貸款總金額。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The number of scheduled payments on the loan.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 貸款的還款期數（例如：36 個月或 60 個月）。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): Interest Rate on the loan.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 貸款的年利率（Annual Percentage Rate, APR）。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The monthly payment owed by the borrower.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人每月必須償還的金額。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The loan grade assigned by the bank (A, B, C, etc.).
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 信用機構分配的貸款總體風險等級。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The sub-grade of the loan grade (A1, A2, B1, etc.).
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 貸款等級的進一步細分。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The job title supplied by the borrower.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人的工作職位。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): Employment length in years.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人目前的工作年資。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The home ownership status of the borrower.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人的房屋狀態（如 RENT/租賃, MORTGAGE/抵押）。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The annual income supplied by the borrower.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人提供的每年總收入。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): Indicates if income was verified by the bank.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 收入是否已經過銀行驗證。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The month in which the loan was funded.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 貸款發放的月份。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): Current status of the loan (e.g., Fully Paid or Charged Off).
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 目標標籤：貸款目前是否已付清或已違約。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): A category provided by the borrower for the loan purpose.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人申請貸款的主要用途類別。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): A ratio calculated using the borrower's total monthly debt payments.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 每月債務支付佔每月總收入的百分比。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The date the borrower's earliest credit line was opened.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人最早開立信用額度的日期。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The number of open credit accounts in the borrower's file.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人目前持有的活躍信用帳戶數量。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): Number of derogatory public records (e.g., bankruptcies).
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 不良公共紀錄的數量（例如：破產）。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): Total credit revolving balance.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人信用卡上未償還的總餘額。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): Revolving line utilization rate.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 已使用信用額度佔總額度的百分比。

英文解釋 (English Explanation): The address provided by the borrower.
中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note): 借款人提供的地址資訊。
